name: Getting Close: Rwanda Mountain Gorillas
description:
Here's another video of my recent trip to Africa and features the incredible Mountain Gorillas in Rwanda.  This was a truly incredible experience. 

This video was originally made for Bunnik Tours - my real job - it's our family company.  We create small group tours around the world specifically designed for the Australian market.  More details at www.bunniktours.com.au

The reason I've also posted this video here is to give this experience a wider audience and show how tourism when done right can be a powerful force for good helping the environment, the local community and the traveller.  And this video makes a nice change from endless flight review :) 

That said, more flight reviews coming up in the next few weeks including Qatar A350 in business and economy and Rwandair!

Camera:  Sony Handycam FDR-AXP55

Thanks for watching and as always, happy travels!
